subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] evp
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Interesting thought! It's possible I suppose. I wonder if anyone has tried
it?

Maybe you can give it a try? If so, I'd recommend recording at the same time
also. Then you can compare the two for results.

Zack
